meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Boomie Aglietti Gina Bernal Chuck Rezac Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6267.

td.p: Boomie Aglietti, a writer for TV and stage from Los Angeles, California
Gina Bernal, a romance novel editor from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Chuck Rezac, a cattle ranch hand from Emmett, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,200)

tr.td: PRIME MINISTERS
TITLE ANIMALS OF KIDS' BOOKS
"BLIND" LEADING THE BLIND
LONG LIVE THE COMPANY
WORLD OF WONDERS
GETTING DEFENSIVE
